message: Hi Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll really like. Would you like to buy it from me for $120?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $60. Can you meet me halfway?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not comfortable going as low as $60. I can meet you halfway from my original offer, so how about we meet at $100?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $90?
I can see you're really interested in the product, and I appreciate your flexibility. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my last offer, so how about we meet at $105?
I'm getting close to my budget, but I'm still a bit above. Would you be willing to go down to $95?
I'm not willing to go as low as $95, but I can meet you halfway from my last offer. How about we meet at $100?
